name: Daryl Twigg
text:
Located across from Best Buy at the Bangor Mall, this Pizza Hut features "Wing Street", and has the lunch pizza buffet and salad bar.
Servers are really friendly, and place exceptionally clean.  Only downside is ‚Ä¶More

name: John Hoshi
text: Good food, makes happiness

name: Karen Horner
text: Friendly staff.  Pizza hot but sauce very acidic.   Not awful but could be better.

name: Remi Paluszak
text: I am sorry but this is a very dated facility with sub par food choices. Frankly, if you want good pizza for lunch go to EMMC. Fresh dough, brick oven and much better ingredients for the same price. Also, while I am not sure it is entirely ‚Ä¶More

name: MiMi Mansfield
text: Place is great! The buffet is always fresh and delicious. Clean dining room. Staff always has a smile!

name: Ameen Rauf
text: One of the best pizza huts I have been too. They customize pizza very well to suite your taste. Also have an excellent salad bar where salads are always fresh! I go there almost every time I visit Bangor Mall

name: Christina Higgins
text: Loved this place till they shut down. :(

name: David A. Woodbury
text: I like a salad bar with pizza for lunch, and Pizza Hut has a pretty good one.  The Bangor Pizza Hut has the friendliest staff too.  (And cherry pie pizza for dessert!)

name: Dog Love
text: Wonderful service and great food! Our server was the best! Very clean.

name: Steve Gallant
text: Our wait person was Asia. She and the food was very good. Cost was fair for what we ordered and timing was fast. THANK YOU

name: Susan Dugan
text: Worst service ever! Waited for a pizza for about 40 mins and never got it, We paid for our beers and left. Never even got an apology.Not going there again!

name: Jazmine Miller
text: Really good food and always for a decent price. I absolitely love that they have a salad bar where you can do take-out

name: ARTHUR BLAKE
text:
Wait staff was okay, but the cook made the wrong dinner for me...
TWICE !  I finally ate the second one so as not to hold up everyone else.
Food was okay. Price was good. Water was normal.

name: Dustin Lagrange
text: The best retail pizza chain out there, by far. This is a newer location and is fairly clean. Staff is generally ok and service is probably average.

name: Travis Smith
text: Pretty nice place to get a quick bite. Its starting to show its age on the outside an bit but the service was wonderful and the food was good

name: Leo McAvoy
text: Good buffet, decent salad bar n pizza selection. Mind u I love pizza, hot or cold, n those cinnamon bread sticks r addicting!

name: Melissa Bryan
text: Buffet was very good.  You definitely get your money's worth.

name: Caitlyn Amber
text: For someone who orders here quite often I was EXTREMELY unhappy with the service tonight.  Gave my wings to the car ahead of me, when I placed my order at 430 to be ready by 5:45, then had us wait to get our wings while the rest of our $50 order was getting cold and didn‚Äôt even offer a discount or an apology.

name: Mark Lesssard
text:
The tables were all sticky and the salad bar was old tasting.
The pizza  was as usual, very tastey

name: Duane Edwards
text: Lettuce in the salad bar was well past it's prime. Good selection of pizza

name: Mary Beth Fraser
text: Place was pretty empty when we came.  Wait staff was friendly.  Food was good.

name: Anthony Young
text: Very good service our waitress was great and the food was quick and tasty

name: Nina Griffiths
text: Nice staff clean and empty!

name: Lisa Blanchard
text: Our party was 15 people ...we were so happy with the service..our waitress was awesome!!

name: Charles D.
text: Price is fair. Food was good. Loved the garlic knots.Waitress was awesome.

name: Hannah Conners-Townsend
text: The pizza isn't that good but the cinnamon bread sticks are great. The service is also very attentive and friendly.

name: rick davis
text: It was not good at all rushed out no refill on drink not a good experience at all. Will not go back to the Bangor Mall Pizza Hut

name: Renee Megquier
text: Food was awesome service was great, floors  table, and bathroom was clean. Don't have any complaints food was ready fast which was great for hungry and impatient children

name: Deliverance
text: The manager is not kind!! She's rude and completely unfriendly! She's rude to her staff and the bufeet sucks even at only $6.75! Do dissatisfied! If recommend the other pizza hut on broadway!

name: jersey gurl
text: Nice place. Problems with Wi-Fi. Good food

name: Brain Dead Lung
text: y‚Äôall make some good üÖ±Ô∏èoneless pizzas

name: Al Sowa
text: Great  staff  fast service  Good  food  fresh  salad bar

name: Used Rubbers
text: I love this place servers are great and they are not over priced like many other places.

name: Seth Koren
text: Great place and ran well by the manager and staff

name: Carol Jones
text: I love pizza hut! Food and staff great and any problems dealt with Immediately and with integrity!

name: Kelly Hamilton
text: Typical Pizza Hut, nice choice during lunch buffet.

name: Janell Anthony
text: Great buffet and awesome menu, easy location and helpful staff.

name: Elise Davis
text: Good pizza, prompt service, fast delivery, friendly employees

name: Randy N
text: Good place to eat, food is great, staff is friendly

name: Jonathan Warren
text: Nice place, looks abandon sometimes though.

name: Randy Field
text: Excellent service good salad bar for Pizza Hut

name: Bill Roberts
text: Great service great food

name: Samantha McCullough
text: If I could give 0 I would. Went with the family for dinner waitress never came around waited over an hour for check and boxes...

name: Lacey Lee
text: Not the biggest fan of their pizza but I love their breadsticks and wings. They have great waiters and waitresses.

name: Jamie Patterson
text: The salad bar had mushy cukes and the talks were sticky.

name: Rachel Allen
text: Great food and great service!

name: Ernest gagne
text: Decent food quick service

name: Nikki Belote
text: They say they deliver within Bangor city limits...yet I live in Bangor and they won't deliver here

name: jitsujuFan
text: No one cares to be working there..weird

name: Melanie Petty
text: Very nice everything was great

name: Catherine Breese
text: Good prompt service.

name: Andrew Moores
text: Food was good but the service was slow and mixed up our order

name: Roderick Collins
text: Great service, fast and courteous.

name: Mike Labbe
text: Good food, staff friendly but we were surrounded by dirty tables. They don't deliver. Buffet doesn't run on weekend. Food is over priced $16 for medium pizza..

name: Christine Whitmer
text: Simply  delicious.

name: Kevin McCutcheon
text: Not the best, but price is fair.

name: Mark Bissell
text: Friendly service was quick

name: Mariah Edwards
text: This location has closed as of 1/31/2018.

name: Wendy Trojano
text: They close a few days later.

name: Bill Powers
